fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-During the night, shoot someone while also piercing through any protective roles
-Your gun takes one night to reload

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -If you kill another Do-Gooder, you reveal yourself at the start of the next day, and may only fire one more shot, as well as making it so no protective roles may go on you the next night

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Reduce the local crime population to none
